name.description: Name of the network configuration. Must be between 1 and 100 characters and may only contain upper and lowercase letters a-z, numbers 0-9, '.', '-', and '_'.

compute_service.description: The hosted compute service to use for the network configuration.

network_settings_ids.description: The identifier of the network settings to use for the network configuration. Exactly one network settings must be specified.

id.description: The unique identifier of the network configuration.

name.description: The name of the network configuration.

compute_service.description: The hosted compute service the network configuration supports.

network_settings_ids.description: The unique identifier of each network settings in the configuration.

created_on.description: The time at which the network configuration was created, in ISO 8601 format.
